title: Getting a full trace (every line) from ollydbg
content:
When I use the ollydbg run trace I don't seem to he getting every single line as I expect to. First off let me explain what Iexpect to see: 

Address hexDumb Command comments EAX ECX etc...
0042AD43 BLAH JNZ 00112345 somecomment 01010101 10101010... etc....
0042AD48 FLAH XOR EAX, ECX anothercomment 01010101 10101010... etc...

Essentially each line from the CPU window, all of the data that you see for each line.

When I step into each command by hand in ollydbg then I get to see each command of the thousands that are executed. However when I use the run trace I get a hand ful of commands, somewhere in the range of 50 commands.
